title: Bills Signed: S. 3222, S. 3250 | The White House
content: On Friday, January 26, 2024, the President signed into law:Â S. 3222, which provides for safety and security exceptions from rules regarding rented office space for Senators; andThank you to Senator Klobuchar for her leadership.S. 3250, which requires Federal courts to provide victims and their relatives with remote access to certain criminal court proceedings related to the December 21, 1988 Pan American Flight 103 bombing over Lockerbie, Scotland.Thank you to Senators Cornyn and Gillibrand for their leadership.###
